creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: top open section is white, lined with predominately maroon floral print, with flaps stitched in geometric diamond designs in predominately maroon; maroon banding trim; long back tail embroidered in predominately maroon organic bands; maroon knotted fringe at bottom with mother-of-pearl buttons and blue, red and green tassels; pink, red, yellow and white ikat on back of tail
dimension: 43 5/8 x 10 1/8 in. (110.81 x 25.72 cm) (including fringe and tassels)
title: Headdress (?)
